title: The Lox Interview and more
itunes:title: The Lox Interview and more
description:
Today on the show we had "The Lox" stop by where they spoke about their new album, the younger generation looking up to them, learning from their past and more. Also we played some of the most hilarious and classic Ask Yee's and remember the time Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to JW Lucas? if not find out why this episode.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
